channel.title: Changes needed to activity scope codelist?
channel.description:
Just reviewing our IATI output for NGO Aid Map, and looking back again at the options in the [activity scope codelist](http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/ActivityScope/). I know many organizations aren't reporting on sub-national location information, but the codes associated with sub-national location seem rather limited:
* 5: Sub-national: Multi-first-level administrative areas * 6: Sub-national: Single first-level administrative area * 7: Sub-national: Single second-level administrative area * 8: Single location
Seems like these options should be consolidated into a single sub-national code, or made more exhaustive.
